ctx: intros i j Hi Hj Heq.
assert (Hneq: i <> j \/ f i <> f j).
exceptions.exn: No such bound variable i (possible names are: n and m).

original: intros i j Hi Hj Heq. assert (Hneq: i <> j \/ f i <> f j). { apply Nat.lt_trichotomy with (i := i) (j := j); [auto| |auto]. } destruct Hneq as [Hneq|Hneq]. - exfalso. apply Hneq. reflexivity. - exfalso. apply (Nat.lt_irrefl (f i)). apply (Nat.lt_trans _ (f j)); [apply Hf2; auto|]. rewrite Heq. apply Hf2; auto.
